TEXT.S:
saayaway a kasumamadan a laylayCuo-kuoa laylay a nu makayni i sulit a cudad, tahekal tu i Sang-chawmalingatu izaw tu ku tulu malebut lima lasubu a mihcaan, namakay caliway tunu tusa tuni sulitan a hulic pawacay, Siy-chawmalingatu izaw ku sepat malebut tusa lasubu a mihcaan, namakay Sang-huang-uw-tiatu nakamuan a mihcaan Cuan-suo-se-daymalingatu pakala tu sepat malebut enem a lasubu a mihcaan, makay Pan-kuSan-tiNi-wanakungkuan nu babalaki a mihcaan pakalal tu lima a mihcaan . (u sulit nu Hulam: ;;;)
itepan tu kasumamadan a laylay piazihan Cuo-kuo-caw-taykasasumamadan a Cuo-kuomiawas tu pinaay a nikakutay tu laylya nu knatal,Hung-timapulung atu malaliyas tu ni u kakutay u zuma satu kapulung tu mihcaan izaw ku Cin-han,Ci-cin,Suy-tang,bey-sunghatini kakatuud kapulung, Yuan-tayMin-tayCin-tay, u ni kalaliyasan a mihcaan izaw ku Chun-ciw-zang-kuSan-kuUw-huw-se-luw-ku-se-ciyNan-pe-cawUw-day-se-kuSung-liyaw-cin-yuanzuku. (u sulit nu Hulam: ) ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 21 a mihcaan, u wawa ni Yumipatizeng tu Chinasaayaway saicelangay a kamihcaan nu Siy-chaw, zikuzan tu sepat lasubu a mihcaan Tang, mabelin ku Siy-chawa kamihcaan, u mahini malakuwit tu kuni u kasumamadan henay a laylay a nikauzipan tatenga' u saayaway nu Cung-yuan-wang-shaw, ayaw pakala tu 1046 a mihcaan Zew-wu-wang, malawpes nu Zew-chaw(u sulit nu Hulam: 1046) patizen tu Zew-chaw, Zew namakay Zew-wu-wang, Zew-zen-wangZew-kang-wangmikuwan tulu a laylayan a mihcaan. patizeng kapah tuni pikuwan tu saykay mala Hung-titu ci,Cen-wangkang-wangmasangangan tu Cen-kang-ze-ce, i tini kala Hung-tinica sa pangangan han tu Cen-kang-ze-cea pikuwan. 841 a mihcaan kanatalay a tademaw malebu mala u Cuo-kuoa laylay, tatenga' malingatu tunian a mihcaan, satu u Zew-chawmalingatu tu kalawlawpesan tu, ayaw nu 771 a mihcaan malawpes tu ku Zew-chawpatizeng tu Dung-zewu Cung-yuanmaaalaw pingangayaw tu Chun-ciw-zang-kua kanatal a kamihcaan. (u sulit nu Hulam: 841771) ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 221a mihcaan, malawpes ni Cin-se-huangku enem a kanatal patizeng satu ku Cin-chaupalacacay hantu ku China. namahica palebung tu u nipikelec pikuwan nu China, malingatu tu ni Cung-yanga saupu tu sakaku mikuwan nu Hung-ti, ayaw nu 207 a mihcaan malawpes tu ku Cin-chaukilul tu ni ngangayaw nu Cu-han-zan-zenmademec ni Liw-pangci Sang-yui tini i ayaw nu 202 a mihcaan hawsa patineng satu Han-chawSi-hannamilawpes tu Wen-cin-ze-ceicelang tu ku Han-uwatu Zaw-sun--ze-ce, Chinau saicelangay tu a kanatal, mala u kakitaan tu. u nu satipan a Lu-ma-di-cumalecat mala u tabakiay tu Hung-tia kanatal. (u sulit nu Hulam: 221202)
